desc: Minimi is the designer of the first reusable nappy pocket (AI2) to fit from under 4 kg to over 21kg. Kiwi artist limited edition prints for the beautiful collection of modern cloth nappies. Bamboo, Hemp, and Cotton make thirsty inserts for night and day. New Menstrual underwear for Light Bladder Leakage available now.

layout.text: Care for your baby, care for the earth. Eco-friendly reusable nappies.
Copyrighted design for a one-size fit from newborn to school-age.
